rule-22-4-a.test_description: Baseline building has two zones.  HVAC is system type 7 and is correctly modeled with outdoor air reset for CHW loop supply temperature control.  Expected result: PASS

standard.rule_description: For baseline chilled water loop that is not purchased chilled water and does not serve any computer room HVAC systems, chilled-water supply temperature shall be reset using the following schedule: 44F at outdoor dry-bulb temperature of 80F and above, 54F at 60F and below, and ramped linearly between 44F and 54F at temperature between 80F and 60F.

rule-22-4-b.test_description: Baseline building has two zones.  HVAC is system type 7 and is incorrectly modeled with incorrect value for outdoor_high_for_loop_supply_reset_temperature for CHW loop supply temperature control.  Expected Result: FAIL
